name: discord-social-sdk-native
description: Node.js native addon for Discord Social SDK

scripts.install: node-gyp configure && node fix-toolset.js && node-gyp build
scripts.build: node-gyp configure && node fix-toolset.js && node-gyp build
scripts.rebuild: node-gyp clean && node-gyp configure && node fix-toolset.js && node-gyp build
